feed.title: Nerdy Day Trips
feed.subtitle: Discover nerdy places to visit with 'The Map'! Find out about each place with a post full of useful information

entry.title: Derwent Pencil Museum
entry.content: The Derwent Pencil Museum is awesome, but was closed due to flooding when I was nearby!
entry.summary: The Derwent Pencil Museum is awesome, but was closed due to flooding when I was nearby!

entry.title: Kirkaldy Testing Museum
entry.content: The Kirkaldy Testing Museum is awesome, but isn’t open very often!
entry.summary: The Kirkaldy Testing Museum is awesome, but isn’t open very often!
